title: Remove background music from the Propose Day page

requirements.text: Remove all background music functionality from `frontend/src/components/ProposeDayPage.tsx`, including the `<audio>` element and all play/pause, mute, volume, and fade-in logic/state.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/components/ProposeDayPage.tsx` no longer renders an `<audio>` element (e.g., the one currently using `src="/assets/audio/chaar-kadam-male-portion.mp3"`).

All music-related React state, refs, effects, and helper functions are removed (e.g., `isPlaying`, `volume`, `isMuted`, `audioRef`, `fadeIntervalRef`, `fadeInAudio`, `togglePlay`, `toggleMute`, `handleVolumeChange`).
The page builds without TypeScript/ESLint errors and has no unused imports related to music controls (e.g., `Play`, `Pause`, `Volume2`, `VolumeX`, `Button`, `Slider` if they become unused).

requirements.text: Remove the fixed on-screen music controls UI from `frontend/src/components/ProposeDayPage.tsx` so there are no music-related buttons or sliders visible anywhere on the page.
acceptanceCriteria: The fixed bottom-right music control panel is no longer rendered.
There is no user-facing text or aria-labels related to music playback (e.g., "Play music", "Pause music", "Mute", "Unmute", "Volume").
The rest of the page layout (hero, teddy bear visual, love letter section, final proposal section, footer, rose decorations) remains present and visually consistent.

constraints: Do not edit files under `frontend/src/components/ui` or any other paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Do not add any new audio, music controls, or alternative sound effects.
Do not change the existing romantic content, section order, or decorative visuals beyond removing music-related UI/logic.
